text: And in your creation that is to say and in the creation of every one of you from a sperm-drop then a blood clot then an embryo until it becomes a human being; and in the creation of what He has scattered what He has dispersed throughout the earth of animals — dābba denotes whatever treads on yadubbu the earth of both human beings and other animals — there are signs for a people who are certain of the Resurrection;
